title: Equipping Your Kids to Handle Money, Part 9
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary: It‚Äôs not always easy to understand the concept of giving, and that when you tithe and when you donate to great organizations that somehow it creates a change in you. John and Danny emphasize that instilling that knowledge in your kids is a necessary lesson.
